scripts.compile: if [ -d 'dist' ]; then rm -r dist && tsc --declaration --declarationMap --pretty --outDir 'dist' && cp -r public dist/public && cp package.json dist/package.json; else mkdir dist && tsc --declaration --declarationMap --pretty --outDir 'dist' && cp -r public dist/public && cp package.json dist/package.json; fi
scripts.start: npm run compile && PORT=8000 node dist/index.js
